lyrics:
7 contributorsam i blue lyricschorus
am i blue yes im blue
it started the day i lost you
nobody ever missed somebody like i do
am i blue am i blue

verse 1
just this morning over coffee
i sat there crying cause youre gone long gone
i didnt know just how much i was gonna miss you
til i spent my first night alone

chorus
am i blue yes im blue
how could i have been such a fool
now look at all the misery im going through
am i blue am i blue

instrumental bridge

verse 2
tried to call and say im sorry
i couldnt get you on the line
youll never know just how much im wishing you would show up
and say youve changed your mind
see george strait liveget tickets as low as 102you might also likechorus
am i blue yes im blue
it started the day i lost you
nobody ever missed somebody like i do
am i blue am i blueembed
